column1: INS Mumbai, amidst its operational cycle, has undergone comprehensive condition-based inspections of shock mounts for various pumps and gas turbines. Multiple shock mount readings are rapidly approaching the warning threshold. The ship is scheduled to set sail within 25 hours for an operational duration of 6 days. Replacement of these shock mounts is essential to maintain mission reliability at 0.89.

Several shock mount readings are on the verge of surpassing the warning threshold. The ship is set to sail within 48 hours for an operational duration of 5 days. Replacing these shock mounts is crucial to uphold mission reliability at 0.91.
